welcome.title: Welcome to Guitar Practice
welcome.description: Your personal practice assistant to help you improve your guitar skills

library.title: Exercise Library
library.description: Browse through our collection of exercises designed for all skill levels

plans.title: Practice Plans
plans.description: Create personalized practice routines to achieve your goals

progress.title: Track Progress
progress.description: Monitor your improvement and stay motivated

steps.browse: Browse the exercise library and find exercises that match your skill level
steps.create: Create a practice plan or add individual exercises to your routine
steps.practice: Start practicing with the built-in metronome and timer
steps.track: Track your progress and celebrate your improvements

tooltips.metronome: Use the metronome to maintain rhythm and gradually increase speed
tooltips.timer: Set practice duration to stay focused and track your practice time
tooltips.difficulty: Start with exercises matching your current skill level
tooltips.skills: Focus on exercises that help develop specific guitar techniques

no_exercises.title: Discover Guitar Exercises
no_exercises.description: Start your journey with our curated collection of guitar exercises or create your own

features.browse_desc: Find exercises tailored to your skill level and interests
features.create_desc: Create and share your own practice exercises

no_plans.title: Start Your Guitar Journey
